meanings.definition: To cause a crick in the neck or back.
meanings.sent1: She cricked her neck while trying to look behind her.
meanings.sent2: He cricked his back while lifting a heavy box.
meanings.sent3: The cat cricked its neck trying to catch its tail.
meanings.sent4: The old door cricked as it swung open slowly.
meanings.sent5: The rusty gate cricked loudly in the wind.

meanings.definition: A painful muscle spasm or stiffness in the neck or back.
meanings.sent1: After sleeping in an awkward position, she woke up with a cricked neck.
meanings.sent2: He had to visit the doctor due to a severe cricked back.
meanings.sent3: The cricked neck made it hard for her to turn her head.
meanings.sent4: The cricked back felt like a heavy weight on his shoulders.
meanings.sent5: The cricked muscle throbbed with each movement.
